structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

text.section: after deducting the administrative expenses of the Agency, all principal and interest received by the Agency under a mortgage made by the Agencyâ€™s predecessor, the Massachusetts government land bank, financed by the proceeds of an industrial development bond or note as such term, or a successor term of comparable import, is defined by the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, issued by the commonwealth on behalf or for the purposes of one of the said Massachusetts government land bank.
monies transferred from the reserves of the Agency pursuant to a vote of the board of directors of the Agency;
all monies transferred pursuant to an authorization by the general court or by law.
